Articles.Content: So I bought ksp about 1 month ago on xbox and I love it, but, it does need a few things just to make the beginning experience better. These things would be like the debug menu in easy mode and a few mods that you guys could put in as add-ons. the game is still amazing but it was kind of frustratingwhen I would crash into the moon or go past it because I ran out of fuel.

Add-ons are probably not a thing that will be implemented. If you want those, play the PC version. The debug menu would be a good thing to add but I'm not sure if it will happen as it hasn't happened yet. And good luck on your moon mission!

Fire
